query:
mutation($userName: String!,
  $name: String!,
  $dateOfBirth: DateTime!,
                  $lastSeen: DateTime!,
                  $seenAtLat: Float!,
                  $seenAtLon: Float!,
                  $photo: Upload!) {
  createNewTiger(userName: $userName,
  name:$name, dateOfBirth: $dateOfBirth,
  lastSeen: $lastSeen,
  seenAtLat: $seenAtLat,
  seenAtLon: $seenAtLon,
  photo: $photo)
}
